data.Name: Creeper
data.Bio: This page refers to at least two artists. 1) Creeper are a horror punk/punk rock six-piece from Southampton. Releasing their eponymous debut EP in 2014 the band have gone from strength to strength, signing to Roadrunner Records before releasing their second EP The Callous Heart in 2015 and their third EP The Stranger in 2016. Oliver Burdett joined the band in 2016 when founding member and guitarist Sina Nemati left the band after The Callous Heart was released. Read more on Last.fm
